pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Contributions-Welcome-brightgreen.svg)](README.md)[![License: LGPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-LGPL%20v3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0)# DLClibraryDLClibrary is a lightweight library supporting universal functions for the DeepLabCut ecosystem.Supported functions (at this point):- API for downloading model weights from the model zoo# Quick start `pip install dlclibrary`- warning, the closely named package `dlclib` is not an official DeepLabCut product.
